nonConformanceDetails.nonConformanceDescription: The supplier delivered a batch of widgets that did not meet our specifications. The widgets were made of a different material than what was specified in the purchase order.
correctiveActions: The supplier has agreed to replace the non-conforming widgets with conforming widgets.
The supplier has implemented a new quality control process to ensure that this type of non-conformance does not happen again.
preventiveActions: We will be working with the supplier to develop a new supplier quality assurance program.
We will be conducting more frequent inspections of the supplier's manufacturing facility.
